@Beta

Package co.cask.cdap.api.messaging

This package contains classes and interfaces for interacting with the Transactional Messaging System.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Message
    Represents a message in the messaging system.
    MessageFetcher
    Provides access to fetch messages from the transactional messaging system.
    MessagePublisher
    Provides access to publish messages to the transactional messaging system.
    MessagingAdmin
    Provides topic administration functions on the transactional messaging system.
    MessagingContext
    Provides access to the transactional messaging system.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MessagingException
    Signals that an exception related to the messaging system has occurred.
    TopicAlreadyExistsException
    Exception thrown when trying to create a topic while the topic of that name already exists.
    TopicNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when trying to operation on a topic while the topic of that name does not exists.

Package co.cask.cdap.api.messaging Description

This package contains classes and interfaces for interacting with the Transactional Messaging System. Note: The Transactional Messaging System is an experimental feature introduced in CDAP 4.0; all APIs related to it are subject to change in future CDAP releases until it is out of Beta phase.
